originalText.text: Love the variety each week and love that for some of the simpler dishes they actually lower the price. Every meal we've tried has been great and I love that I don't have to meal plan and shop. I absolutely love Dinnerly! And I'm not a food photographer, so sorry if the pics aren't the best. One is roasted veggie mac & cheese. The other is chipotle honey fried chicken tacos, with and without the slaw to show off the chicken better. Both were so good!

originalText.text: After about 3 months, I am enjoying a variety of dishes I would never known of.  They have made one change I asked for and delivery is great.  Always plenty of food for 2 and sometimes some for next day lunch.

text.text: After about 3 months, I am enjoying a variety of dishes I would never known of.  They have made one change I asked for and delivery is great.  Always plenty of food for 2 and sometimes some for next day lunch.

originalText.text:
Dinnerly is my favorite meal kit & what I've chosen to stick with. They're affordable without sacrificing quality. The food is legit restaurant quality for cheaper.

I checked, and I literally have 51 meal options this week, so clearly they have a large variety of choices. Their options are diverse and more creative than just pork + veggie. They have very healthy options & comfort food options, as well as dishes that are both. They have unqiue foreign dishes as well as well-known homey dishes. I especially recommend their Chicken Chilaquiles Verde, it tasted AMAZING and was ultra easy to make.

No problems except 2 small missing items which they refunded me for immediately as credit, no hassle. The recipes are easy & fun to make.

Overall I'm super happy with Dinnerly and I would recommend them to anyone who wants to learn to cook delicious healthy meals. I can get 3 meals of 4 servings for around $80. Think about it, thats a pretty good price for restaurant quality food, plus I sometimes have leftovers & I'm learning all these great recipes at the same time.

The only thing I dislike is they don't have recipe cards, but I think they may offer cards as an option soon.
